attributes.action: Introduce a system similar to The Bundesliga’s 50+1 rule in English football
attributes.additional_details: The Bundesliga boasts low season ticket prices, high attendances and a class quality of football. Also there is more competition between clubs unlike in our top flight. Furthermore, due to this rule no club in Germany has ever went bust in the 21st century as opposed to many clubs in the football pyramid
attributes.background: As clubs like Bury have fell prey to greedy businessmen, maybe this would have not have happened if the club and it’s fans owned a 50+1% of the club. This would benefit the English football league system as it has done in Germany

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for football clubs and their governing bodies.

There are petitions about the governance of football clubs. You might like to sign one or more of these.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/268665

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/262817

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/268289
